author: KanTakahiro
message:
Fix: use unidic-lite instead of ipadic as the tokenizer dictionary for Japanese (#33372)

* Fix: use unidic-lite instead of ipadic as the tokenizer dictionary of Japanese

Signed-off-by: Kan Takahiro <kan@Kans-Mac-mini.local>

* fix the default name

---------

Signed-off-by: Kan Takahiro <kan@Kans-Mac-mini.local>
Co-authored-by: Kan Takahiro <kan@Kans-Mac-mini.local>
Co-authored-by: Arthur Zucker <arthur.zucker@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -380,7 +380,7 @@ def __init__(
         do_lower_case=False,
         never_split=None,
         normalize_text=True,
-        mecab_dic: Optional[str] = "ipadic",
+        mecab_dic: Optional[str] = "unidic_lite",
         mecab_option: Optional[str] = None,
     ):
         """
